summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments and extensions to the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the completion of the construction and acquisition of a two story office building; declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be; providing the funds therefor by appropriation of $304,000 from the surplus in the Light Fund as a temporary advance to Capital Account; authorizing the Board of Public Works to prepare plans, etc.
